short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and restore your browser tab sessions with a single click using SessionVault.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save, organize, and restore your browser tabs with ease!

Tired of losing your tabs or reopening the same set of websites every day? SessionVault is the ultimate productivity tool that allows you to save, name, and restore your browser sessions quickly.




Key Features
Save Sessions: Save all your open tabs into organized sessions with just one click.

Name Your Sessions: Give each session a custom name to keep things clear and organized (e.g., "Work Research," "Shopping List," "Learning Resources").

Restore Saved Tabs: Reopen your saved tabs instantly when you need them. Never lose track of your important work or favorite sites!

Session Overview: See the total number of tabs saved along with the date and time for easy reference.

Clean and Simple Interface: User-friendly design to save and manage sessions effortlessly.
